rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 28 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 8:03 PM, 15 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Cavite, Metro Manila, Pampanga and Tarlac within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Quezon(Catanauan), Nueva Ecija(General Tinio, Cabanatuan, Santa Rosa, San Leonardo, Penaranda, Palayan, Bongabon), Bataan(Mariveles, Bagac) and Batangas(Nasugbu) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
